meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wooden.
meanings.sent1: The woodennesses of the table made it feel sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent2: The woodennesses of the forest added to its peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The woodennesses of the actor's performance in the play brought unintentional humor to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The woodennesses of his response to the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The woodennesses of the ship's deck creaked under our feet as we sailed.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling or being made of wood.
meanings.sent1: The woodennesses of the sculpture made it look incredibly lifelike.
meanings.sent2: The woodennesses of the furniture gave the room a cozy and rustic feel.
meanings.sent3: The woodennesses of the cake decoration fooled everyone into thinking it was real wood.
meanings.sent4: The woodennesses of her voice resonated through the auditorium, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The woodennesses of the cabin walls reminded him of his childhood spent in the forest.
